data.text: "Selena has reached out to Demi's family members to share her love and prayers, and she is really distraught about her health," the source says. "She hates that Demi has been suffering."

When Selena found out the news about Demi,she was very upset & emotional,"a source tells E! News The perennially popular Disney Channel actresses"haven't been close friends in a while now,"the source notes,"but they always shared a special bond & they still have love."
